description: Defines a singleton NotesRepository class providing CRUD operations and LiveData access to Note objects, interfacing with NotesDatabase and NoteDao.

classes.name: NotesRepository
classes.description: Repository class managing note data access and operations, implemented as a thread-safe singleton.

methods.name: getNotes
methods.description: Returns a LiveData list of all notes.

methods.name: getNote
methods.description: Fetches a specific note by its ID, asynchronously.

methods.name: addNote
methods.description: Inserts a new note with provided title and content, returns the new note ID.

methods.name: getInstance
methods.description: Provides the singleton instance of NotesRepository, initializing it if necessary.
